website_summaries.verdict: Watching movies on a tablet is well and good, but to get real immersive entertainment, a 15.6-inch laptop with multiple speakers like the Asus N550JV-DB72T is the portable equivalent of a home theater system, plus it also qualifies as a power user system.

customer_reviews.title: laptop review
customer_reviews.text: I have had this computer laptop for slightly over 2 years. This purchase was worth it, at the time the graphics card and processor were really good specs, and they still are. Im able to play video games such as emulators and pc games. the backlit keyboard is a great look too when using your laptop in the dark. the picture quality is also great, with great detail. the little speaker it comes with also packs a punch. Not to mention the touch screen the laptop has. when you dont want to use the trackpad, you can use the touch screen on it. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: FitnessLife

customer_reviews.title: Whamma-Jamma Machine!
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem getting connected to the Internet at first (low signal at my location) but once I got a TP-Link extender (TP-LINK TL-WA850RE N300 Universal Wireless Range Extender, Wi-Fi Repeater, Wall Plug, Plug&Play, Ethernet Port, Smart Signal Indicator Light) that was resolved and this is the nicest machine I've ever used. The one piece of advice I'd give is that if you upgrade to Windows 8.1, make sure to install a new ATKACPI driver for the backlit keyboard to work (googling it works better than trying to find it on the ASUS website).
customer_reviews.author: al h

customer_reviews.title: Problems at Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The screen did not turn on. I connected via hdmi to my tv and display everything. Contacted ASUS support service and told me i had to return it because it was a faulty MOBO. I was traveling and need it, so i proceed to open it and notice the screen plug was disconnected. Also there are some issues with the battery (sometimes it doesnt charge) so you need to open it and remove the battery and place it again. Anyhow not very impressed with it but its ok.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. KAMUI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent !!!
customer_reviews.text: I just realized I got this one on 2013. It's still rock and rolling. It is sooo good that I'm using it 100% at my business replacing the Dell desktop. I got a bigger monitor and also a bigger keyboard...that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful laptop- look no further!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is not only beautiful and well built but completely does all that it claims to. Just received it a week ago and after searching for so long, this is the ONE. It has ALL that I was looking for with FULL HD screen AND a DVD drive. It's THIN and fairly light to carry around. I have no problems with any functionality. I feel this laptop will last me a very long time and still be $1000 less than the macbook pro! Beautiful screen, and never gets hot.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine!
customer_reviews.text: It had the processor and screen I wanted, memory, weight, etc. You can swap out the HDD for an SSD and the wi-fi for an intel AC chip. Traveled with for several thousand miles and no issues to date. Runs for 4hrs on a charge which is just fine for my needs. Very fast and functions as a portable desktop replacement. ASUS has some rules about swapping parts so check before you do it. Asus has been very helpful in answering my questions.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great price for average pc gamers!
customer_reviews.text: UPGRADED with Crucial SSD 240GB. Rating (windows experience index) : 5.9 pts So far, I'm satisfied with this purchase. Pros: A pretty light-weight laptop (compared to others 15.6 inch laptop) Great design (Macbook look-alike) Touch-screen, solid back-lit keyboard with numpad Lightning fast Intel core i7 4th gen GT750M is a pretty good GPU Fan is quiet while playing video games compared with Lenovo, HP, and Alienware laptops Battery lasts longer than I've thought Included a portable mini-speaker (great bass resonance) Cons: A little bit hot while playing games (but that's ok because a gamer needs to have a cooling pad) Wireless adapter 802.11 b/g/n (hopefully I can replace it with 802.11 a/c) HDD 5400rpm (SSD is awesome)
customer_reviews.author: Son Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: 3 years of use
customer_reviews.text: Hard drive failed today, after two years of moderate and one year of very light use. It has been generally a good machine, but it the construction just doesn't seem to be the greatest quality. The keyboard caused some problems early on and had to be repaired. The CD drive is loose, and lately it's been having sound issues when connecting via HDMI. Not a bad lifespan for a laptop, really.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: I like it but there are serious drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: It's a powerful computer. Just look at the components. - The hard drive slows the whole thing down so if you're going to buy one, replace the drive - Windows 8 is terrible and it's twice as hard to update drivers. If you're thinking about paying for windows 7, do that. If you keep 8 go easy on the apps. - I HATE the mouse pad, made worse by windows 8 limiting the options. If I wanted a Mac I'd of bought one. Nothing you can do but buy a wireless mouse. Other than that. I've been very happy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great computer...
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great. Just a note, if you have trouble with shutdowns and reboots taking forever (5 minutes or more) after upgrading to Windows 8.1, uninstall the Qualcomm bluetooth drivers, restart, then download and reinstall the bluetooth drivers from the Asus support site. This resolved this issue immediately for me. The bluetooth works fine, and my shutdowns and startups now take about 20 seconds. Annoying issue, but easily resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works but not on Win 8.1
customer_reviews.text: Bought Lenovo IdeaPad Y510p. It sucked. Bought this. Build Quality was not as good as Lenovo in some areas (Keyboard) but better in others (Screen). Touch Screen works. Win 8 is Win 8 (Love it or hate it). Tried to upgrade to 8.1 one but again (like the Lenovo) ran into drivers issues from NVIDIA, ASUS and Microsoft (Screen is black, each company blaming the other). This laptop works better then the Lenovo but after this I will be moving back to a macbook pro even if it means losing the NVIDIA card.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher J. Wise

customer_reviews.title: My best computer so far!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! The best computer ever. Really cheap for the quality and everything it has. I recommend and upgrade of the DVD to BD disc and if you can you should upgrade the HDD to SSD. If you do that It is the best computer ever, really! Touchscreen works nice! You can upgrade to SSD and clone your drive and then use the HDD as an external HDD> However, just as it is is the perfect computer for entertainment and heavy work i7 does its work!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Alberto Mier Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop. Fairly light weight, design and ergonomics is quit good. Love the back lit keyboard. Windows 8 is smothing to get use to. I'll need to upgrade to Win 8.1. Battery life is very good for day to day use, browsing, and running Office apps. I use it for my Real Estate business for all on-line proposals, docs, and presentations. I'll purchase 2 more for my business soon.
customer_reviews.author: Knowland

customer_reviews.title: About the touchscreen ...
customer_reviews.text: This computer was originally for my mom and the touchscreen just didn't work right -- there was something wrong it sliding to different screens. So instead of getting another one of the same computer we ended up returning and then selecting (basically) the same computer without the touchscreen and she loves it. While this was definitely a malfunction of the screen --and probably just one of those one in a thousand chances that we got a bad screen-- that doesn't mean it won't be a great product for others.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I will Never Buy Another ASUS Product Again!
customer_reviews.text: My computer is constantly crashing and I get the BSOD at least once a week. It turns out that the graphics card they used in this model is incompatible with the rest of the hardware. It takes forever to load and boot up. NEVER AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: not sure how to rate this
customer_reviews.text: First two days i had it i love it. Great screen resolution, easy set up. Third day turned it on and just got a blank screen. Good news is that my BFF amazon prime made return very easy and was given prompt and full refund. I do most of my shopping on this site and rarely need to return so that was a big relief. If you get a good one you will probably love it too. Just a warning that their quality control may not be as good as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: diana lee

customer_reviews.title: A very powerful laptop
customer_reviews.text: Pros: An outstanding processor A nvidia 750GT capable of ANY game nowadays with reasonable quality The touchscreen is very sensible The battery can hold a lot considering that it is not intended to be energy saver Neutral: The audio without the woofer is not so good, but fortunately it comes with a good woofer that makes all the difference Cons: Doesnt have a VGA port (you can adapt but doesnt come with the adapter) The touchpad presents some missclicks sometimes The Hard Drive is slow and a little noisy
customer_reviews.author: Rogers Guilherme Reichert

customer_reviews.title: Great, light gaming machine.
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying this laptop a lot since I bought it. I was worried it wouldnt' be able to hold up to my demanding gaming but it has done very, very well. I play a lot of Diablo 3: ROS, WoW and Skyrim and this laptop has been up to those challenges. So far I would highly recommend this laptop. The touch screen works very well, the video cards can be weird to set in 8.1 but they work and the battery life is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Meshugga

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and meh all around
customer_reviews.text: Graphics are OK, but it gets pretty hot and the battery doesn't last long when gaming on it. The left control key barely works. I really have to press the key hard. It isn't even with the rest of the keys. Did I mention this thing is heavy? The speakers are pretty weak. The keyboard back light doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: UFGeek

customer_reviews.title: First ASUS - I Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I would buy an ASUS again. I've never owned one before and I love this laptop. The keyboard tactile feel is perfect and I do enjoy having the number pad on the right. The touch screen is beautiful. I'm 46 so I sometimes have trouble seeing small print so be aware that as you increase the pixel count on these screens, the print becomes smaller. The bottom line is that I would buy this exact model again if I had to do it all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Collins

customer_reviews.title: Love My New Laptop!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received it like promised. Opened it up and thought I received the wrong laptop because it was bigger than I expected!! Nice screen, great picture but not to happy with the sound quality. Love that it plays all my games like Sims3 without any lagging or freezing. Also no OVERHEATING!!! Love it. Last thing I have to say is I have windows 8 and upgraded to 8.1 BIG mistake!!! Nothing but problems. Are they fixing it?? Any way I am always happy with my orders from Amazon. Thank you Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serve the needs for power user as well as watching movies
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Class-leading performance. Multimedia-oriented features. 1080p HD IPS screen. Sub woofer included. Mutii-speaker sound. Fast wake from sleep. HDMI and mini-DisplayPort. Touch screen. Cons: No Blu-ray. Short battery life. But other then that severs my needs. Watching movies on a tablet is well and good, but to get real immersive entertainment, a 15.6-inch laptop with multiple speakers is the portable equivalent of a home theater system, plus it also qualifies as a power user system. Bottom Line its a great laptop for doing everything I do on Illustrator and Photoshop for my work
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give my opinion about this touchscreen laptop, after shopping for a laptop with pretty much everything I wanted I found this laptop. It has good memory, and overall specs. However, the only reason it is not a 5 star is because, it has a couple of gliches when watching videos. The video screen gets pixelated and a green screen with blur. I have to stop the movie and then try again. Another little problem I found was the WiFi connection. Its not the best. Often drops the signal. I love that its a touchscreen, but thats pretty much it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise G.

customer_reviews.title: touchscreen only lasted 11 days and then the battery started dieing in about an hour.
customer_reviews.text: This is crap that it only lasted 11 days before the touchscreen went out and then the battery would only last an hour I needed a reliable computer for school and this isn't it now I have to send it in to get repaired I think they should just give me a new one I can't be without a computer. everyone said how good asus is, well I haven't had very good luck I had an asus transformer tablet and the keyboard stopped working in less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ASUS N550JV
customer_reviews.text: An excellent choice for a desktop replacement. Great screen and keyboard. I also own an ASUS ultrabook but felt ok with this heavier model as it was only being used in my home office.
customer_reviews.author: G from Ontario

customer_reviews.title: Powerful ASUS!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new laptop! It is powerful and fast! The full keyboard is good. The sound is awesome with the mini-subwoofer attachement. Love the metal frame. Only a few minor compaints: The touch screen sometimes stops working, and the sound sometimes doesn't start up loud enough to hear until you turn it up. Also, bluetooth seems to only work on certain devices. However, I think these problems are windows and driver issues.
customer_reviews.author: RegWhite53

customer_reviews.title: Computer worked good but didn't last more than 4 months
customer_reviews.text: When I got the computer it worked well and had no problems with the functioning. It did though make funny clicking sounds when opening and closing. It didn't sound to serious so I didn't give it much thought, then after 4 months went to close it and the screen split apart at the seams. I thought that the workmanship would be better for ASUS.
customer_reviews.author: Aundrea

customer_reviews.title: Everything is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this laptop as I expected. All the features and performance are exactly as descrobed. There're only one thing I don't like. They only provide Win8, but I like Win7. So I have to reinstall it based on Win8. Now I have two OS systems on my new laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaogang Wu

customer_reviews.title: overall a good system
customer_reviews.text: Works real well. I have noticed a few issues with the video not acting right after a high graphics game (like WOW) is played, but it works during the game just fine. Also whenever the computer needs to be restarted, it can take up to 5 minutes. This is just insane. During normal and heavy operations though, it is a fast, great computer. It just needs to learn how to let go of its operations afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrennon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent team recommend 100%
customer_reviews.text: Hello friends, is my third laptop "ASUS", I can only express my satisfaction and joy of having made the decision to buy this machine, I can only give him five stars for which they have earned, excellent !!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop I've owned in 30 years. I think I'd have preferred to change out the HD to SSD from the get go (via ProStar). Can't say enough good things about this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: MMMM-HMMM!!
customer_reviews.text: oh, yeah. Great machine. Sound quality is phenomenal. Touchpad sensitivity is ideal. The only downside is the mechanical drive, but I knew that it would be when I bought it. I'll upgrade to SSD as soon as I can, and then this computer will have a place in my will if I die. Love it
customer_reviews.author: jnatemath

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong item from amazon warehouse deals
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and instead received the N56VJ-DH71. On top of being the wrong machine, the listing said all the accessories came repackaged - the sub-woofer was missing. Trying to work with customer service right now to get this sorted out for a return since the only option for a return requires me to pay the initial shipping cost. I will probably change this review once I am able to get the right device in my hands. Giving this more than one star right now only because the customer service is trying to help me out.
customer_reviews.author: Phil H

customer_reviews.title: Still kicking after 3.5 years
customer_reviews.text: I've owned and used this laptop heavily for 3.5 years. I'm only leaving feedback because I'm shocked that it's still working great and able to run brand new video games. Additionally, I've had practically zero problems with it. The only negatives to this laptop is it's sound and screen brightness. Other than that, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop, just a little problem
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good computer, the build materials are good and beautiful, the touchpad and keyboard are good, it has very good specs, the touchscreen is awesome (1080p resolution, very sharp, responsive, great colors, and so on). The thing I don't like is the wireless adapter, it gives a lot of troubles, I'm still looking for a solution to this... Did I mentioned the subwoofer? well, it is awesome too! (you have to equalize for better results).
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard Contrast
customer_reviews.text: I like the computer in most respects, however, the keyboard is often hard to see. The keys are silver and offer little contrast to the key labels. The traditional black keys with white labels are far superior. The light under the keys does not help. In someways the light makes things worse.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Underwood

customer_reviews.title: A really good computer.
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer. I found Windows 8 easy enough to use. It's just a matter if being logical and trying a few different combinations. A minor drawback is that some of my hardware is not compatible with Win 8.1
customer_reviews.author: Ron LeTard

customer_reviews.title: Get it if you staill can
customer_reviews.text: Superb in it day. Tremendous value and performance for the price. After 4 years it is still going strong and I7 is still kicking butt,
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Ola

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This laptop runs circles around my old 15" Alienware. Plays all my games great and stays cool doing it. I've played Lord of the Rings Online for hours on this laptop and it gets a little warm but never gets hot. It also stays quiet while playing games.
customer_reviews.author: Instigator

customer_reviews.title: Quality notebook
customer_reviews.text: The notebook is well built and has a great screen. I like the features and it is very comfortable for working on at your desk. Be sure to keep in mind it is a notebook not a laptop and too heavy for lap use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No battery installed
customer_reviews.text: I really like the laptop but the warehouse deals unit I received had no battery installed. I found another deal from a 3rd party vendor and thus will return it.
customer_reviews.author: pbo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, but little too heavy and battery life isn't great. Otherwise, great screen and sound. Very zippy.
customer_reviews.author: Phil S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and powerful computer, the best cost benefit from market...
customer_reviews.text: Strong: - Processor - Resolution - Capacity - Play most modern games very well (do notoverheat) Weak: - a bit heavy - keyboard config (delete/insert use function button) - Windows 8 (I've changed to Win7) - HD 5400 rpm may seem slower
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo G

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop. I bought crucial ssd hard drive, I'm waiting screwdrivers, to drive change. When I felt slow on my laptop, I run windows task manager and sluggishness is due to disk access. Excellent laptop, as a function of price. Touch screen is not necessary. I think the solution applies touch screen when you can have the solution for laptop and tablet in the same solution.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Vicente

customer_reviews.title: Good hardware, bad software
customer_reviews.text: The 3 stars reflects my overall satisfaction. The machine/hardware is fine except for the keyboard which has black letters on light silver background which makes them hard to see in low light. Windows 8 and Office really, really is simply terrible. I feel like those products have devolved not evolved.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this a long time ago and it has delivered beyond expectation
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Choi

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a good laptop. We have not had any problems with it. It does everything we need it to. This was purchased for my daughter for school work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Eatmon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and state of the art!
customer_reviews.text: Referred from an expert. Everything as expected. Windows 8. Touch screen laptop. Verrrry satisfied! HD is outstanding. Strong durable destruction.
customer_reviews.author: Aine

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this laptop. Very nice build quality, stunning display, powerful and runs very cool doing every day stuff. I haven't games yet though. I am sure that would heat things up. Windows 8 is very stable once you download all the updates. I had some Blue screens of death after resuming from hibernation or sleep but this was solved once Windows updates were done.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Turrell

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: 1) 4th Gen I7 processor 2) Full high resolution touch screen 1920x1080 3) Dual graphics Intel/NVIDIA GT-750M 4) Good battery life 5) Ok Keyboard 6) 1TB drive I went ahead and upgraded the the following; 1) Wireless card to a Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 7260 2) Installed 16GB of memory 3) Upgraded the optical drive to Blu-ray.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Hard drive & Windows didn't work well.
customer_reviews.text: Asus support sucks. They won't fix the Windows problems. Replaced the hard drive with a SSD. I had to buy windows 8.1 myself to solve my problems. Otherwise the laptop is amazing. Plays WoW on Ultra no problem. Graphics are amazing. Get's kinda warm. Fan blows on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cooper

customer_reviews.title: UGH! Stick w/Better Known Brands
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy an ASUS laptop. Customer service process is pathetic. Website support is awful - difficult to navigate, drivers don't download, etc. Within a year my keyboard stopped working. Six months later it shuts down suddenly when not on the power cord. NO FIX!
customer_reviews.author: Amy C. Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding in every way!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a laptop that was capable of being not only an above average computer for business and personal use but one that was also capable of giving outstanding graphics and frame rates when used for online games, specifically MMORPG types. The Asus was one of the few laptops that met my requirements without requiring me to get a second mortgage!
customer_reviews.author: James Trunzo

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with what the description said.
customer_reviews.text: Said it comes with a blue-ray dvd combo and blue-ray writer. It does not have that. It is also not non-glare.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is not too big or heavy and has plenty of horsepower. It has been very stable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jaiya Rampersad

customer_reviews.title: The GPU wasn't that great compared to its competitions at the time
customer_reviews.text: The GPU wasn't that great compared to its competitions at the time, but the laptop was really good in other aspects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Already broke screen and sent it back and had it repaired under free warranty. Excellent service, great laptop, very happy
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Laptop for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this laptop to any one who is interested. Gorgeous screen, best track and keys Ive used in this price range, and extremely quick regardless of the 5400 rpm drive.
customer_reviews.author: Kiel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gamers and architecture students
customer_reviews.text: The laptop came on time. I bought it for my architecture studies and it's perfect, has everything I need and more. The touch screen is very easy to use. I'm in love with my computer.
customer_reviews.author: fsciamarelli

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: parts are cheap and will break just after the warranty, particularly the monitor and display
customer_reviews.author: Arman M.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: love this laptop. Been wanting a high end laptop for years. Excellent value for money, combining gaming features with touchscreen and great windows functionality. The screen size is perfect for travel gaming and graphics card handles COD and Medal of honour type games. Awesome keyboard and touchpad. It is on the heavy side and has a large heavy power supply but I don't mind because of the amazing quality and features. Extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Watts

customer_reviews.title: Great computer at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I am a media/casual gamer(actually just wow) and this computer has everything advertised. The only thing that can be frustrating is the slow hdd drive which can easily be replaced for a ssd drive for about 200 dollars. Great value and look...
customer_reviews.author: William Finlayson

customer_reviews.title: Good overall computer.
customer_reviews.text: I use this laptop for work and recreation. Programming in java and web based languages, but I also play games like CS:GO, Fallout NV and whatever else I feel like playing. Hard drive is partitioned into two, one smaller ~370Gb partition for the OS, and a ~540 partition for data. For a total of ~1TB. I love this computer, but finding a spare charger for it can be annoying if you do it at walmart, buy it online and you'll have no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Robert V.L.

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Very responsive touch screen, the processor is great, the keyboard, as well. Personally, I prefer black keyboard, and I think backlit works better in those, but this laptop has three levels of light. It is also a little heavy, but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Rusty Silva Carmo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is awesome. It's taking some time to get used to the windows 8 setup, but the actual machine is beast.
customer_reviews.author: Rach. H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Laptop
customer_reviews.text: points to remember -its some what heavy bcz its all alluminium body -trackpad is not so good but keyboard is good - battery is above average (about 4 hrs normal use)
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic for all the purposes im using it for, it's a little bit buggy at times, but there are no consistent problems! thanks asus
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: no better options, you can choose this
customer_reviews.text: the laptop is pretty good except the following problems. (1) the Hard Drive Rotational Speed is 5400. The speed is a little slow. (2) the keyboard is hard to use. Other features are quite good.
customer_reviews.author: yzhooo

customer_reviews.title: Expectations were met.
customer_reviews.text: The ASUS N550JV-DB72T 15.6-Inch Touchscreen Laptop was for our son, He researched considerably before the purchase decision. His research paid off - he loves the computer.
customer_reviews.author: tdub

customer_reviews.title: Awesome computer
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, easy to use... Very happy w purchase, awesome large hard drive, love the touch screen, excellent screen picture quality
customer_reviews.author: Heather J. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: I can't describe how powerful and amazing is this laptop. It is a little heavy but the performance and quality is according the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and with nice design laptop. I have nothing to add, I just trust Asus that's why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Oldklim

customer_reviews.title: ASUS N550 - beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, just as described, exactly the way I wanted and needed. Nice desing, great performance. If you are looking for something more than a regular laptop, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Aline

customer_reviews.title: Old Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: It has no solid state drive or hybrid drive, so working with win8 with a traditional hard drive leads to a bad performance. Otherwise the laptop is well equiped for an architectural/design use.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice screen Cons: Keyboard Slow HDD Windows 8 Broke after 4 month Customer service After 4 month, I'd recommend to buy Lenovo or Apple depending on your needs.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop, using it for the last one and a half years. Will again buy an Asus product in the future. Excellent quality and after sales service.
customer_reviews.author: Anjistha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just an excellenmt all-around computer. i ve had it for more than a year now and everything still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Santana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing PC
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. For the price this computer is great. It excels in nearly everything. The only thing that it is lacking is an outstanding graphics card but everything else is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Don't update to Win 8.1
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. To be honest, the hard drive is the weakest link, you should consider buying a 7200rpm or a SSD. I have been completely unable to use the graphics card for anything since I updated to win 8.1 I've installed new and old drivers and nothing. Before that, everything was smooth. EDIT: To fix the issue of the graphics card not being recognized by Win 8.1, just update to the latest BIOS. As reference for gamers out there, I usually play D3, SC2, Torchlight II which run without problems, BF3 and BF4 do run smoothly, but with low settings.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Gamez

customer_reviews.title: good laptop for game
customer_reviews.text: high hardware so it is very suitable for playing game. this computer looked very nice and the keyboard very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Weisi Shao

customer_reviews.title: Really Great!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop met my expectations in every single way and I'll be using it for a long, long time! Just pure awesomeness!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Bankston

customer_reviews.title: ASUS N550JV-DB72T 15.6-Inch Touchscreen Laptop
customer_reviews.text: i like it .....a very good laptop....the display have a perfect size, a resolution is ok and the touchscreen is useful......the processor is very fast.....was a very good buy....
customer_reviews.author: GALO CUEVA

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: As a college student who plays a few video games on the side, this laptop exceeds my requirements & I love it! Note if you have a monitor you like to use, it only has an HDMI output. The battery lasts 3+ hours depending on activity level (if I have the wifi turned off, it lasts even longer!). I have been using it for about a month now without any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: amc

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Fast! Fast boot up, fast processing speed, just plain fast. For the price this is the best laptop to buy if you are either editing video (that's me) or playing games that are heavy video. The only negative is Windows 8. However that isn't the fault of ASUS, it's Microsoft.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality|up-to-day features with affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. You got most of the up-to-day features with affordable price. Down side: easy to get hot with average load.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Lan

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and before even turning it on replaced the memory (16gb cas 9), hard drive (Samsung 840evo 1tb) and wireless (Intel 7260ac+bluetooth). The machine specs as built limited the performance of the laptop too much for my taste, but the price was right for the platform. Performance is outstanding with the upgrades, and Windows 7 AND 8.1 have great performance. (W7 experience of 7.3) Only reason I give it 4 stars is the initial hard drive was slow, the battery life is mediocre, and the edges are sharp (Not sharp as in good design, but sharp as in don't let it slip or it will cut your fingers). Otherwise, it's a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal D Pflum

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop for under $1000, Shipped safely and securely.
customer_reviews.text: Highly reccommended. I am very impressed with my new Asus laptop. If you have the money, it is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend told me I should buy a nice PC, so he chose this one for me! It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Batista Carraro

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else!
customer_reviews.text: This Asus really is a piece of junk, it is not what I expected from Asus, after less than 2 years with this laptop multiple keys on the keyboard have stopped working, and from reading reviews on here and elsewhere this is a very common issue with this laptop. I would stay away from this, buy a mac pro and put windows on it and then run it for the next 4 years, you will be way happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle A.

customer_reviews.title: ... to replace my Dell and I have not been disappointed. It has so many more functional features than ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop to replace my Dell and I have not been disappointed. It has so many more functional features than the Dell - too many to list here since I am not the best review writer. You won't be disappointed with the ASUS.
customer_reviews.author: JanL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pc
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product one year ago. And during that time at the begining never had a problem. It was until 8 months of use that my screen just stopped working. The laptop was on but never saw an image, even tried to connect via HDMI to my tv. So I sent it with the support service to get it fixed, it lasted 2 months there and just got it back. Other than that screen problem it is a great computer and I absolutely recommend it. My guess is I just had bad luck with a failed product.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Chavarria

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to play games on. It has been able to handle everything I've thrown at it so far. Including games like GW2, Skyrim, CoD Ghosts, and Battlefield.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McQuinn

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STAR RATING
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful as well as powerful. Everything I was hoping for. I installed Windows 8.1 before doing anything else and have not had any problems so far. Though it takes a bit to get used to at first. I may need to buy a quick reference guide or a book to make full use of Windows 8.1. The HD touch screen is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the original laptop because it was having problems. Now after four months with the second one, I'm having problems again. This laptop sticks all of the time, shuts down without notice. Not sure what the problem is and hopefully they will send me another one since it's still under warranty. I only wish I had not taken the second one but just sent it back and got another brand.
customer_reviews.author: GB Chavis

customer_reviews.title: As good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a good performance every day/task laptop it is a nice computer. The good features that make it nice are the quality of sound, Asus add-ons and overall good performance. What doesn't reach the expectations is the windows 8 terrible sync with the hardware, the Asus drive updater that do not work properly and the headset and sub woofer jacks that some times have connection problems.
customer_reviews.author: Luiz Henrique Fernandes Salmonson

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: It is a really great computer. I love the touch screen. It is like having a super tablet. Get one.
customer_reviews.author: TonyH

customer_reviews.title: Excelent computer!!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is awesome!! The design!! the screen, the touchscreen work very very good!! a good all around machine!! Totally i will recommend this machine to more people!!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Aguirre Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great notebook for almost everything.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this notebook for a few days now and it has yet to disappoint me. It dose everything well, it can play pretty much every game with the right settings, works great for photo editing, and movies look fantastic on the 1080p screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Peña

customer_reviews.title: Great computer, just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a full keyboard but not the weight. This is perfect. My only tiny complaint is the mouse on the lap top is a little stubborn. Nothing that a wireless mouse can't fix!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: What is the purpose of making a 1 TB laptop if your processor cannot recognize the D drive?
customer_reviews.author: K. Pierre

product_meta.title: ASUS N550 15-Inch Laptop [OLD VERSION]
product_meta.description:
Core i7 4700HQ / 2.4 GHz - Windows 8 64-bit - 8 GB RAM - 1 TB HDD - DVD-Writer - 15.6" wide 1920 x 1080 / Full HD - NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M - gray - with 32 GB ASUS WebStorage (3 years)
